field.name: vc_enable
field.label: Enable Addons for Visual Composer
field.description: If disabled, the addon library addons will not appear for Visual Composer

field.name: vc_group_cats
field.label: Group Addons By Categories
field.description: Put categories Visual Composer addons dialog. Otherwise show all the addons in one folder named in the next setting

field.name: vc_folder
field.label: Visual Composer Folder
field.description: The name of the folder in visual composer addon selector

field.name: vc_put_import_metabox
field.label: Put Layout Import Metabox
field.description: Put layout import metabox in posts or pages where visual composer is active

field.name: vc_post_types
field.label: Include in Post Types
field.description: Choose if the addon library will be included only on Visual Composer enabled pages, or in all post/page views

field.name: vc_page_thumbs_type
field.label: Addons Select Dialog Presentation
field.description: Select presentation type of the addons in visual composer select addon dialog
